title: Online journal on letterpress
content:
The June issue of Galley Gab...an online journal devoted to things letterpress has been published. The PDF can be downloaded from this site:

[http://www.galleygab.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822031126/http:/www.galleygab.net/ "http://www.galleygab.net")
author: mikeoconnor

comments.content: Nice! Any chance of this ever NOT being delivered as PDF?
